INP 3000

The INP3000 programmer board provides a programming interface for Talaria TWO modules. It can be used with scripts found in the Talaria TWO SDK.

INP 3000 Programmer Boards

  • INP3000 Programmer Board
    • VERSION 2.1
  • INP3000 Programmer Board
    • VERSION 3.0
  • INP3000 Programmer Board
    • VERSION 4.0
